Chap. 18 - Security in the Home


     Human Love Should Draw on Divine Love.--It is only in Christ that a marriage alliance can be safely formed. Human love should draw its closest bonds from divine love. [SEE SECTION V, "LIFE'S ENERGIZING FORCE."] Only where Christ reigns can there be deep, true, unselfish affection.--MH 358 (1905).
